basics.summary: Current PhD Student at the Instituto de Astrofísica de Canarias (IAC)

work.telescopes: IAC80 (3 nights), Isaac Newton Telescope (INT, 15 nights)

sumary: One week stay along with Giulia Golini, working with Dr. Francesca Fragkoudi using the AURIGA Superstars simulations.

work.institution: University of California, Riverside (UCR), Riverside, CA, USA.
work.Host: Dr. Laura Sales & Dr. Gabriela Canalizo
sumary: Five weeks stay regarding my PhD thesis, working with relevant people studying AGN galactic outflows.

work.institution: Liverpool John Moore University (LJMU), Liverpool, UK.
work.Host: Dr. Robert Grand & Dr. Andrea Foont
sumary: Two months stay regarding my PhD thesis, working with relevant people in the galaxy formation area.

work.institution: Max-Planck.Institur für Extraterrestrische Physik (MPE), Garching, Germany.
sumary: Two months' stay funded by ERASMUS+ Traineeship program. Studying galaxy voids as cosmological laboratories.
Participation in the development of the LISA project as part of an external internship from the bachelor's.

education.studyType: Supervised by Arianna Di Cintio and Robert J. J. Grand
